entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
